name: Shuffleboard Showdown
description:
In this intense contest of champions, players must fling themselves into their opponents to knock them around. Knock your opponent into obstacles to further decimate their morale and health points. Last player standing is rootin' tootin'.

 Controls: Click to select the player piece located at the bottom upon starting a game. To fling yourself, click and drag on the selected player piece to control the direction and power.
